Second Battle of the Fords of Isen
The Chronology of The Lord of the Rings
The Lord of the Rings: A Reader's Companion
The Passing of the Grey Company

wikitext.*:
{{ardayearheader|3016|3017|3018|3019|3020|3021|Fourth Age 1}}
==January==
* '''8''' - The [[Fellowship of the Ring|Company]] reach [[Hollin]].<ref name="AppB3">{{App|B3}}</ref>
* '''11''' - The Company ascend the [[Redhorn Gate]]<ref name=chronology1>''[[The Chronology of The Lord of the Rings]]'', p. 40</ref> and are overtaken by [[Snow]]<ref name=chronology1/> on [[Caradhras]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''12''' - Snowstorm<ref name=chronology1/>.<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''13''' - Attack by [[Wargs]]<ref name=chronology1/> in the early hours. The [[Fellowship of the Ring|Company]] reaches the [[West-gate]] of [[Moria]] at nightfall. [[Gollum]] begins to trail the [[Ring-bearer]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''14''' - Night in [[Twenty-first Hall|Hall Twenty-one]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''15''' - The [[Bridge of Khazad-dûm]], and fall of [[Gandalf]]. The [[Fellowship of the Ring|Company]] reaches [[Nimrodel the river|Nimrodel]] late at night.<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''17''' - The [[Fellowship of the Ring|Company]] comes to [[Caras Galadhon]] at evening.<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''23''' - [[Gandalf]] pursues the [[Balrogs|Balrog]] to the peak of [[Celebdil|Zirakzigil]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''24''' - Gollum is captured and questioned by [[Uglúk]], but he escapes later. [[Saruman]] sends reinforcements to Uglúk; his troop is now about 180 strong.<ref>{{HM|RC}}, p. 360</ref>
* '''25''' - Gandalf casts down the [[Balrogs|Balrog]], and passes away. His body lies on the peak.<ref name="AppB3"/>

==February==
* '''15''' - The [[Mirror of Galadriel]]. [[Gandalf]] returns to life, and lies in a trance.<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''16''' - Farewell to [[Lothlórien]]. [[Gollum]] in hiding on the west bank observes the departure.<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''17''' - [[Gwaihir]] bears [[Gandalf]] to [[Lothlórien]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''23''' - The boats are attacked at night near [[Sarn Gebir]].<ref name="AppB3"/> [[Shadowfax]] returns to [[Edoras]].<ref>{{TT|Riders}}</ref>
* '''25''' - The [[Fellowship of the Ring|Company]] pass the [[Argonath]] and camp at [[Parth Galen]]. [[First Battle of the Fords of Isen]]; [[Théodred]] son of [[Théoden]] slain.<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''26''' - [[Breaking of the Fellowship]]. Death of [[Boromir]]; his horn is heard in [[Minas Tirith]]. [[Meriadoc Brandybuck|Meriadoc]] and [[Peregrin Took|Peregrin]] captured. [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] and [[Samwise Gamgee|Samwise]] enter the eastern Emyn Muil. [[Aragorn]] sets out in pursuit of the [[Orcs]] at evening. [[Éomer]] hears of the descent of the Orc-band from the [[Emyn Muil]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''27''' - [[Aragorn]] reaches the west-cliff at sunrise. [[Éomer]] against [[Théoden]]'s orders sets out from [[Eastfold]] about midnight to pursue the Orcs.<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''28''' - [[Éomer]] overtakes the [[Orcs]] just outside [[Fangorn Forest]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''29''' - [[Meriadoc Brandybuck|Merry]] and [[Peregrin Took|Pippin]] escape and meet [[Treebeard]]. The [[Rohirrim]] attack at sunrise and destroy the [[Orcs]]. [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] descends from the [[Emyn Muil]] and meets [[Gollum]]. [[Faramir]] sees the funeral boat of [[Boromir]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''30''' - [[Entmoot]] begins. [[Éomer]] returning to [[Edoras]] meets [[Aragorn]].<ref name="AppB3"/>

==March==
* '''1''' - [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] begins the passage of the [[Dead Marshes]] at dawn. [[Entmoot]] continues. [[Aragorn]] meets [[Gandalf]], and forgets to celebrate his 88th birthday. They set out for [[Edoras]]. [[Faramir]] leaves [[Minas Tirith]] on an errand to [[Ithilien]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''2''' - [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] comes to the end of the [[Dead Marshes]]. [[Gandalf]] comes to [[Edoras]] and heals [[Théoden]]. The [[Rohirrim]] ride west against [[Saruman]]. [[Second Battle of the Fords of Isen]]. [[Erkenbrand]] defeated. [[Entmoot]] ends in afternoon. The [[Ents]] march on [[Isengard]] and reach it at night.<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''3''' - [[Théoden]] retreats to [[Helm's Deep]]. [[Battle of the Hornburg]] begins. [[Ents]] complete the destruction of [[Isengard]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''4''' - [[Théoden]] and [[Gandalf]] set out from the [[Hornburg]] for [[Isengard]]. [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] reaches the slag-mounds on the edge of the [[Desolation of the Morannon]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''5''' - [[Théoden]] reaches [[Isengard]] at noon. Parley with [[Saruman]] in [[Orthanc]]. [[Nazgûl|Winged Nazgûl]] passes over the camp at [[Dol Baran]]. [[Gandalf]] sets out with [[Peregrin Took|Pippin]] for [[Minas Tirith]]. [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] hides in sight of the [[Morannon]], and leaves at dusk.<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''6''' - At dawn [[Gandalf]] and [[Pippin]] reach [[Edoras]].<ref name="Minas">{{RK|V1}}</ref> [[Aragorn]] overtaken by the [[Grey Company]] in the early hours.<ref name="AppB3"/> [[Aragorn]] uses the [[Orthanc-stone]] to reveal himself and [[Andúril]] to [[Sauron]].<ref>{{RK|V2}}</ref>  [[Théoden]] sets out from the [[Hornburg]] for [[Harrowdale]]. [[Aragorn]] sets out later.<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''7''' - [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] taken by [[Faramir]] to [[Henneth Annûn]]. [[Aragorn]] comes to [[Dunharrow]] at nightfall.<ref name="AppB3"/> [[Gandalf]] and [[Peregrin Took|Pippin]], riding through [[Anórien]], see the [[Warning beacons of Gondor]] lit.<ref name="Minas"/>
* '''8''' - [[Aragorn]] takes the [[Paths of the Dead]] at daybreak; he reaches the [[Stone of Erech]] at midnight. [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] leaves [[Henneth Annûn]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''9''' - [[Gandalf]] reaches [[Minas Tirith]]. [[Faramir]] leaves Henneth Annûn. [[Aragorn]] sets out from [[Erech]] and comes to [[Calembel]]. At dusk [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] reaches the [[Morgul-road]]. [[Théoden]] comes to [[Dunharrow]].<ref name="AppB3"/> The [[Red Arrow]] is presented by [[Hirgon]] to [[Théoden]].<ref>{{RK|V3}}</ref> [[Darkness]] begins to flow out of [[Mordor]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''10''' - The [[Dawnless Day]]. The [[Muster of Rohan]]: the [[Rohirrim]] ride from [[Harrowdale]]. [[Faramir]] rescued by [[Gandalf]] and [[Imrahil]] outside the gates of the City. [[Aragorn]] crosses [[Ringló]]. An army from the [[Morannon]] takes [[Cair Andros]] and passes into [[Anórien]]. [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] passes the [[Cross-roads]], and sees the [[Minas Morgul|Morgul]]-host set forth.<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''11''' - [[Gollum]] visits [[Shelob]], but seeing [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] asleep nearly repents. [[Denethor]] sends [[Faramir]] to [[Osgiliath]]. [[Aragorn]] reaches [[Linhir]] and crosses into [[Lebennin]]. Eastern [[Rohan]] is invaded from the north. First [[assaults on Lothlórien|assault]] on [[Lothlórien]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''12''' - [[Gollum]] leads [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] into [[Shelob's Lair]]. [[Faramir]] retreats to the [[Causeway Forts]].<ref name="AppB3"/> [[Théoden]] camps under [[Min-Rimmon]]. [[Aragorn]] drives the [[Southrons]] towards [[Pelargir]]. The [[Ents]] defeat the invaders of [[Rohan]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''13''' - [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] captured by the [[Orcs]] of [[Tower of Cirith Ungol|Cirith Ungol]], including [[Shagrat]] and [[Gorbag]]. The [[Pelennor]] is over-run. [[Faramir]] is wounded. [[Aragorn]] reaches [[Pelargir]] and captures the fleet. [[Théoden]] in [[Drúadan Forest]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''14''' - [[Samwise Gamgee|Samwise]] finds [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] in [[Tower of Cirith Ungol|the Tower]]. [[Minas Tirith]] is besieged. The [[Rohirrim]] led by the [[Woses]] come to the [[Grey Wood]].<ref name="AppB3"/> [[Easterlings]] have passed the [[Carnen]] and pushed King [[Brand]]; [[Battle of Dale]] begins.<ref group=note>This date is based on the reference that the Battle of Dale lasted 3 days.</ref>
* '''15''' - In the early hours the [[Witch-king]] breaks the Gates of the City. [[Denethor]] burns himself on a pyre. The horns of the [[Rohirrim]] are heard at cockcrow. [[Battle of the Pelennor Fields]]. [[Théoden]] is slain. [[Éowyn]] and [[Meriadoc Brandybuck|Meriadoc]] wounded. [[Aragorn]] raises the standard of [[Arwen]]. Frodo and Sam escape and begin their journey north along the [[Morgai]]. [[Battle under the trees]] in [[Mirkwood]]; [[Thranduil]] repels the forces of [[Dol Guldur]]. Second [[assaults on Lothlórien|assault]] on [[Lothlórien]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''16''' - [[Last Debate]] of the commanders in Minas Tirith. [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] from the [[Morgai]] looks out over the camp to [[Mount Doom]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''17''' - [[Battle of Dale]]. King [[Brand]] and King [[Dáin Ironfoot]] fall. Many [[Dwarves]] and [[Men]] take refuge in [[Lonely Mountain|Erebor]] and are besieged. [[Shagrat]] brings [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]]'s cloak, mail-shirt, and sword to [[Barad-dûr]],<ref name="AppB3"/> where Sauron slays him.<ref>{{HM|RC}}, "The Land of Shadow", p.608</ref>
* '''18''' - The Host of the West marches from [[Minas Tirith]]. [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] comes in sight of the [[Isenmouthe]]; he is over-taken by [[Orcs]] on the road from [[Durthang]] to [[Udûn (valley)|Udûn]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''19''' - The Host comes to [[Morgul Vale]]. [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] and [[Samwise Gamgee|Samwise]] escape and begin their journey along the road to the [[Barad-dûr]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''21''' - A force of Orcs and Easterlings attempt to ambush lead companies of the Host.<ref>{{RK|V10}}</ref>
* '''22''' - The dreadful nightfall. [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] and [[Samwise Gamgee|Samwise]] leave the road and turn south to [[Mount Doom]]. Third [[assaults on Lothlórien|assault]] on [[Lothlórien]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''23''' - The Host passes out of [[Ithilien]]. [[Aragorn]] dismisses the faint-hearted. [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] and [[Samwise Gamgee|Samwise]] cast away their arms and gear.<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''24''' - [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] and [[Samwise Gamgee|Samwise]] make their last journey to the feet of [[Mount Doom]]. The Host of the West camps in the Desolation of the [[Morannon]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''25''' - The Host is surrounded on the Slag-hills of [[Dagorlad]]. [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] and [[Samwise Gamgee|Samwise]] reach the [[Sammath Naur]]. [[Gollum]] seizes [[The One Ring|the Ring]] and falls in the [[Cracks of Doom]]. Downfall of [[Barad-dûr]] and passing of [[Sauron]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''27''' - [[Bard II]] and [[Thorin Stonehelm|Thorin III Stonehelm]] drive the enemy from [[Dale]].<ref name="AppB4">{{App|B4}}</ref>
* '''28''' - [[Celeborn]] crosses [[Anduin]], destruction of [[Dol Guldur]] begun.<ref name="AppB4" />

==April==
* '''6''' - Meeting of [[Celeborn]] and [[Thranduil]].<ref name="AppB4" />
* '''8''' - The [[Ring-bearers]] are honoured on the [[Field of Cormallen]].<ref name="AppB4" />

==May==
* '''1''' - Coronation of [[Aragorn|King Elessar]], [[Elrond]] and [[Arwen]] set out from [[Rivendell]].<ref name="AppB4" />
* '''8''' - [[Éomer]] and [[Éowyn]] depart for Rohan with [[Elrohir]] and [[Elladan]].<ref name="AppB4" />
* '''20''' - [[Elrond]] and [[Arwen]] come to [[Lothlórien]].<ref name="AppB4" />
* '''27''' - The escort of Arwen leaves [[Lothlórien]].<ref name="AppB4" />

==June==
* '''14''' - The sons of [[Elrond]] meet the escort and bring [[Arwen]] to [[Edoras]].<ref name="AppB4" />
* '''16''' - The escort of [[Arwen]] sets out for [[Gondor]].<ref name="AppB4" />
* '''25''' - King [[Aragorn|Elessar]] finds the sapling of the [[White Tree of Gondor|White Tree]].<ref name="AppB4" />

==1 [[Lithedays|Lithe]]==
* [[Arwen]] comes to the [[Minas Tirith|city]].<ref name="AppB4" />

==[[Midyear's Day]]==
* Wedding of [[Aragorn|Elessar]] and [[Arwen]].<ref name="AppB4" />

==July==
* '''15''' - [[Arwen]] gives [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] her place to sail into the West.<ref name="Partings">{{RK|VI6}}</ref>
* '''18''' - [[Éomer]] returns to [[Minas Tirith]].<ref name="AppB4" />
* '''22''' - The funeral escort of King [[Théoden]]  sets out from [[Minas Tirith]].<ref name="AppB4" />

==August==
* '''7''' - The escort comes to [[Edoras]].<ref name="AppB4" />
* '''10''' - Funeral of [[Théoden]].<ref name="AppB4" />
* '''14''' - The guests take leave of King [[Éomer]].<ref name="AppB4" />
* '''15''' - [[Treebeard]] releases [[Saruman]] from [[Orthanc]].<ref name="Partings"/>
* '''18''' - They come to [[Helm's Deep]].<ref name="AppB4" />
* '''22''' - They come to [[Isengard]], they take leave of the [[King of the West]] at sunset.<ref name="AppB4" />
* '''28''' - They overtake [[Saruman]]; Saruman turns towards [[the Shire]].<ref name="AppB4" />

==September==
* '''6''' - They halt in the sight of the [[Mountains of Moria]].<ref name="AppB4" />
* '''13''' - [[Celeborn]] and [[Galadriel]] depart, the others set out for [[Rivendell]].<ref name="AppB4" />
* '''22''' - The hundred and twenty-ninth birthday of [[Bilbo Baggins|Bilbo]]. [[Saruman]] comes to [[the Shire]].<ref name="AppB4" />

==October==
* '''5''' - [[Gandalf]], [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]], [[Samwise Gamgee|Sam]], [[Meriadoc Brandybuck|Merry]] and [[Peregrin Took|Pippin]] leave [[Rivendell]].<ref name="AppB4" />
* '''6''' - They cross the [[Ford of Bruinen]]; [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] feels the first return of pain.<ref name="AppB4" />
* '''28''' - They reach [[Bree]] at nightfall.<ref name="AppB4" />
* '''30''' - They leave [[Bree]]. The "Travellers" come to the [[Brandywine Bridge]] at dark. [[Gandalf]] leaves to visit [[Tom Bombadil]].<ref name="AppB4" />

==November==
* '''1''' - The four Hobbits are arrested at [[Frogmorton]].<ref name="AppB4" />
* '''2''' - They come to [[Bywater]] and rouse the Shire-folk.<ref name="AppB4" />
* '''3''' - [[Battle of Bywater]], and Passing of [[Saruman]]. End of the [[War of the Ring]].<ref name="AppB4" />
*'''4''' - Frodo rides to [[Michel Delving]] and releases prisoners from the [[Lockholes]] including Lobelia Sackville-Baggins.<ref name=havens>{{RK|Havens}}</ref>
==December==
*Thanks to the Ruffians's stores of goods discovered in Michel Delving and [[Scary]], the Hobbits have an especially cheerful [[Yule]].<ref name=havens/>
{{References|n}}
[[Category:Third Age years|3, Third Age 3019]]
[[fi:3019]]
